snippet: HERMAN--Harold Samuel, Esq. April 27, 1930 - February 28, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Molly Mckeen Herman and devoted brother of the late Jean Herman, longtime and revered New York Trial Attorney and cherished friend to the many who shared his love for the American Songbook and a good poker game. Kathleen Landis Daryl Sherman Nancy Winston 1/3
lead_paragraph: HERMAN--Harold Samuel, Esq. April 27, 1930 - February 28, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Molly Mckeen Herman and devoted brother of the late Jean Herman, longtime and revered New York Trial Attorney and cherished friend to the many who shared his love for the American Songbook and a good poker game. Kathleen Landis Daryl Sherman Nancy Winston 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HERMAN, HAROLD SAMUEL
